title: BJP Deleted Names Of 54 Lakh Voters With AI: Mamata Banerjee

title: How to build AI systems in 2026? Google Brain co-founder shares three crucial tips
description: AI pioneer Andrew Ng shares three essential tips for people entering the field of artificial intelligence. He urges them to take structured AI courses, practice building systems, and read research papers. Ng also emphasizes understanding foundations to avoid reinventing the wheel.
